data.title: Mena Suvari Files for Divorce From Simone Sestito
data.meta_description: Actress Mena Suvari, who married Simone Sestito in Jun. 2010, officially filed for divorce on Friday afternoon, according to new reports.OK! NEWS: MENA SUVARI'S
data.text:
Actress Mena Suvari, who married Simone Sestito in Jun. 2010, officially filed for divorce on Friday afternoon, according to new reports.

OK! NEWS: MENA SUVARI'S READY TO REMARRY

The legal documents, filed at the LA County Superior Courthouse, revealed that the 32-year-old and Simone actually decided split in November of last year, Radar Online reports.

OK! NEWS: MENA SUVARI TIES THE KNOT IN ITALY
